trans-unit.source: Enumerates the elements of a nongeneric dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 枚举非泛型字典中的元素。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#]
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic、 C#]

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用`foreach`建议而不是直接操作枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> method also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>方法还会枚举器放回此位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置，调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>属性引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，必须调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 或 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 之前，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 返回同一对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 将 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>还返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，则调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要再次将 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 并接着调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之间修改集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: This code example shows how to define a dictionary enumerator that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例演示如何定义一个字典的枚举器实现<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>接口。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current" /> property that is inherited from <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> returns an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is a boxed <see cref="T:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry" />, similar to the return value of the <see cref="P:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current" />从继承的属性<see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />返回<see cref="T:System.Object" />，它是一个装箱<see cref="T:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry" />，类似于的返回值<see cref="P:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets both the key and the value of the current dictionary entry.
trans-unit.target: 同时获取当前字典项的键和值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry" /> containing both the key and the value of the current dictionary entry.
trans-unit.target: 同时包含当前字典项的键和值的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry" />。

trans-unit.source: After an enumerator is created or after the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry%2A> property; otherwise, <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个枚举器或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>调用方法时，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>必须调用方法来枚举器向前移动到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry%2A>属性; 否则为<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry%2A>是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry%2A> also throws an exception if the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry%2A> 如果最后一次调用到也会引发异常<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，指示集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry%2A> does not move the position of the enumerator, and consecutive calls to <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry%2A> return the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry%2A> 不会移动的位置的枚举器，并对连续调用<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry%2A>之前返回同一对象<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator" /> is positioned before the first entry of the dictionary or after the last entry.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator" /> 定位于字典的第一项之前或最后一项之后。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current" /> property that is inherited from <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> returns an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is a boxed <see cref="T:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry" />, similar to the return value of the <see cref="P:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current" />从继承的属性<see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />返回<see cref="T:System.Object" />，它是一个装箱<see cref="T:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry" />，类似于的返回值<see cref="P:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Entry" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key of the current dictionary entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前字典项的键。

trans-unit.source: The key of the current element of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 当前枚举元素的键。

trans-unit.source: After an enumerator is created or after the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A> property; otherwise, <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个枚举器或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>调用方法时，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>必须调用方法来枚举器向前移动到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A>属性; 否则为<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A>是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A> also throws an exception if the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A> 如果最后一次调用到也会引发异常<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，指示集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A> does not move the position of the enumerator, and consecutive calls to <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A> return the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A> 不会移动的位置的枚举器，并对连续调用<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A>之前返回同一对象<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator" /> is positioned before the first entry of the dictionary or after the last entry.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator" /> 定位于字典的第一项之前或最后一项之后。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the current dictionary entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前字典项的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current element of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 当前枚举元素的值。

trans-unit.source: After an enumerator is created or after the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A> property; otherwise, <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个枚举器或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>调用方法时，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>必须调用方法来枚举器向前移动到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A>属性; 否则为<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A>是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A> also throws an exception if the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A> 如果最后一次调用到也会引发异常<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，指示集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A> does not move the position of the enumerator, and consecutive calls to <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A> return the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A> 不会移动的位置的枚举器，并对连续调用<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A>之前返回同一对象<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator" /> is positioned before the first entry of the dictionary or after the last entry.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator" /> 定位于字典的第一项之前或最后一项之后。
